# Data Set
Put together the data set:
1. Player
2. Position
3. Team
4. Pick
5. isKeeper

```{r}
keepers <- c(
  "Justin Turner",
  "Miles Mikolas",
  "Whit Merrifield",
  "Archie Bradley",
  "Patrick Corbin",
  "Matt Carpenter",
  "Blake Treinen",
  "Ronald Acuna Jr.",
  "Blake Snell",
  "Lorenzo Cain",
  "Trevor Story",
  "Andrew Benintendi",
  "Mike Clevinger"
)

draft_results <- read_tsv("data/draftResults.tsv") %>%  
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(-mlb_team) %>%
  mutate(player = chartr("áéóíñú", "aeoinu", player)) %>% 
  mutate(keeper = (player %in% keepers)) 


```
